TestCase.name: testBinaryComparison
TestCase.Resource: select 1<'1' as f0, 1<='1' as f1, 1>'1' as f2, 1>='1' as f3, 1='1' as f4, t1_date > t1_timestamp as f5, '2' is not distinct from 2 as f6, '2019-09-23' between t1_date and t1_timestamp as f7, cast('2019-09-23' as date) between t1_date and t1_timestamp as f8 from t1

LogicalProject(F0=[false], F1=[true], F2=[false], F3=[true], F4=[true], F5=[>(CAST($8):TIMESTAMP(0) NOT NULL, $7)], F6=[true], F7=[AND(>=(2019-09-23 00:00:00, CAST($8):TIMESTAMP(0) NOT NULL), <=(2019-09-23 00:00:00, $7))], F8=[AND(>=(2019-09-23 00:00:00, CAST($8):TIMESTAMP(0) NOT NULL), <=(2019-09-23 00:00:00, $7))]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, T1]])

TestCase.name: testBooleanEquality
TestCase.Resource: select 1=true as f0, 1.0=true as f1, 0.0=true=true as f2, 1.23=t1_boolean as f3, t1_smallint=t1_boolean as f4, 10000000000=true as f5 from t1
LogicalProject(F0=[true], F1=[true], F2=[false], F3=[$10], F4=[=($1, CASE($10, 1:SMALLINT, 0:SMALLINT))], F5=[true]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, T1]])

TestCase.name: testBuiltinFunctionCoercion
TestCase.Resource: select 1||'a' from (values true)
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[||('1':VARCHAR, 'a')]) LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ true }]])

TestCase.name: testCaseWhen
TestCase.Resource: select case when 1 > 0 then t2_bigint else t2_decimal end from t2
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[CAST($3):DECIMAL(19, 0) NOT NULL]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, T2]])

TestCase.name: testCastNullAsIntUnionChar
TestCase.Resource: select CAST(null AS INTEGER) union select '10'
LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ null }, { '10' }]])

TestCase.name: testInDateTimestamp
TestCase.Resource: select (t1_timestamp, t1_date) in ((DATE '2020-04-16', TIMESTAMP '2020-04-16 11:40:53')) from t1
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[AND(=($7, 2020-04-16 00:00:00), =(CAST($8):TIMESTAMP(0) NOT NULL, 2020-04-16 11:40:53))]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, T1]])

TestCase.name: testInOperation
TestCase.Resource: LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ true, true, true }]])

TestCase.name: testInOperationWithNull
TestCase.Resource: select 1 in (null, '2', '3') as f0, 1 in ('1', null, '3') as f1, (1, 2) in ((null, '2')) as f2, (1, 2) in (('1', null)) as f3, (1, 2) in (('1', '2'), ('1', cast(null as char))) as f4, (1, 2) in (('1', '3'), ('1', cast(null as char))) as f5 from (values (null, true, null, null, true, null))

LogicalProject(F0=[null:BOOLEAN], F1=[CAST(true):BOOLEAN], F2=[null:BOOLEAN], F3=[null:BOOLEAN], F4=[CAST(true):BOOLEAN], F5=[null:BOOLEAN]) LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ null, true, null, null, true, null }]])

TestCase.name: testInsertQuerySourceCoercion
TestCase.Resource: insert into t1 select t2_smallint, t2_int, t2_bigint, t2_real, t2_double, t2_decimal, t2_int, t2_date, t2_timestamp, t2_varchar20, t2_int from t2

LogicalTableModify(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, T1]], operation=[INSERT], flattened=[false]) LogicalProject(t1_varchar20=[CAST($1):VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL], t1_smallint=[CAST($2):SMALLINT NOT NULL], t1_int=[CAST($3):INTEGER NOT NULL], t1_bigint=[CAST($4):BIGINT NOT NULL], t1_real=[CAST($5):REAL NOT NULL], t1_double=[CAST($6):DOUBLE NOT NULL], t1_decimal=[CAST($2):DECIMAL(19, 0) NOT NULL], t1_timestamp=[CAST($8):TIMESTAMP(0) NOT NULL], t1_date=[CAST($7):DATE NOT NULL], t1_binary=[CAST($0):BINARY(1) NOT NULL], t1_boolean=[<>($2, 0)]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, T2]])

TestCase.name: testIntegerImplicitTypeCast1
TestCase.Resource: with t1(x) as (select * from (values (cast(1 as bigint)),(cast(2 as bigint))) as t1), t2(x) as (select * from (values (3),(4)) as t2) select * from t1 where t1.x in (select t2.x from t2)

LogicalProject(X=[$0]) LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $1)], joinType=[inner]) LogicalProject(T1=[$0]) LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 1 }, { 2 }]]) LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) LogicalProject(X=[CAST($0):BIGINT NOT NULL]) LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 3 }, { 4 }]])

TestCase.name: testIntegerImplicitTypeCast2
TestCase.Resource: with t1(x) as (select * from (values (cast(1 as tinyint)),(cast(2 as tinyint))) as t1), t2(x) as (select * from (values (3),(4)) as t2) select * from t1 where t1.x in (select t2.x from t2)

LogicalProject(X=[$0]) LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $2)], joinType=[inner]) LogicalProject(T1=[$0], EXPR$0=[CAST($0):INTEGER NOT NULL]) LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 1 }, { 2 }]]) LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) LogicalProject(X=[$0]) LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 3 }, { 4 }]])

TestCase.name: testNotInOperation
TestCase.Resource: select 1 not in ('1', '2', '3') as f0, (1, 2) not in (('1', '2')) as f1, (1, 2) not in (('1', '2'), ('3', '4')) as f2 from (values (false, false, false))
LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ false, false, false }]])

TestCase.name: testNotInOperationWithNull
TestCase.Resource: select 1 not in (null, '2', '3') as f0, 1 not in ('1', null, '3') as f1, (1, 2) not in ((null, '2')) as f2, (1, 2) not in (('1', null)) as f3, (1, 2) not in (('1', '2'), ('1', cast(null as char))) as f4, (1, 2) not in (('2', '3'), ('1', cast(null as char))) as f5 from (values (null, false, null, null, false, null))

LogicalProject(F0=[null:BOOLEAN], F1=[CAST(false):BOOLEAN], F2=[null:BOOLEAN], F3=[null:BOOLEAN], F4=[CAST(false):BOOLEAN], F5=[null:BOOLEAN]) LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ null, false, null, null, false, null }]])

TestCase.name: testSetOperation
TestCase.Resource: select t1_int, t1_decimal, t1_smallint, t1_double from t1 union select t2_varchar20, t2_decimal, t2_real, t2_bigint from t2 union select t1_varchar20, t1_decimal, t1_real, t1_double from t1 union select t2_varchar20, t2_decimal, t2_smallint, t2_double from t2

LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalProject(T1_INT=[CAST($2):VARCHAR NOT NULL], T1_DECIMAL=[$6], T1_SMALLINT=[CAST($1):REAL NOT NULL], T1_DOUBLE=[$5]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, T1]]) LogicalProject(T2_VARCHAR20=[$0], T2_DECIMAL=[$6], T2_REAL=[$4], T2_BIGINT=[CAST($3):DOUBLE NOT NULL]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, T2]]) LogicalProject(T1_VARCHAR20=[$0], T1_DECIMAL=[$6], T1_REAL=[$4], T1_DOUBLE=[$5]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, T1]]) LogicalProject(T2_VARCHAR20=[$0], T2_DECIMAL=[$6], T2_SMALLINT=[CAST($1):REAL NOT NULL], T2_DOUBLE=[$5]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, T2]])

TestCase.name: testStarImplicitTypeCoercion
TestCase.Resource: select * from (values(1, '3')) union select * from (values('2', 4))

LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[CAST($0):VARCHAR NOT NULL], EXPR$1=[$1]) LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 1, '3' }]]) LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$0], EXPR$1=[CAST($1):VARCHAR NOT NULL]) LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ '2', 4 }]])

TestCase.name: testUpdateQuerySourceCoercion
TestCase.Resource: update t1 set t1_varchar20=123, t1_date=TIMESTAMP '2020-01-03 10:14:34', t1_int=12.3

LogicalTableModify(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, T1]], operation=[UPDATE], updateColumnList=[[t1_varchar20, t1_date, t1_int]], sourceExpressionList=[[CAST(123):VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, CAST(2020-01-03 10:14:34):DATE NOT NULL, CAST(12.3:DECIMAL(3, 1)):INTEGER NOT NULL]], flattened=[false]) LogicalProject(t1_varchar20=[$0], t1_smallint=[$1], t1_int=[$2], t1_bigint=[$3], t1_real=[$4], t1_double=[$5], t1_decimal=[$6], t1_timestamp=[$7], t1_date=[$8], t1_binary=[$9], t1_boolean=[$10], EXPR$0=[123], EXPR$1=[2020-01-03 10:14:34], EXPR$2=[12.3:DECIMAL(3, 1)]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, T1]])
